name: SampleRate
description: Server sample rate. Returns the current sample rate of the server.

name: SampleDur
description: Sample duration. Returns 1 / SampleRate (duration of one sample in seconds).

name: ControlRate
description: Server control rate. Returns the current control rate of the server.

name: ControlDur
description: Control period duration. Returns 1 / ControlRate (duration of one control block).

name: RadiansPerSample
description: Radians per sample. Returns 2Ï€ / SampleRate, useful for oscillator calculations.

name: NumOutputBuses
description: Number of output buses. Returns the number of audio output buses on the server.

name: NumInputBuses
description: Number of input buses. Returns the number of audio input buses on the server.

name: NumAudioBuses
description: Total number of audio buses. Returns the number of audio buses allocated on the server.

name: NumControlBuses
description: Number of control buses. Returns the number of control buses allocated on the server.

name: NumBuffers
description: Number of buffers. Returns the number of buffers allocated on the server.

name: NumRunningSynths
description: Number of running synths. Returns the current number of synths running on the server.
